definition: abounding in or exposed to the wind or breezes
details:
adjective
- abounding in or exposed to the wind or breezes
= synonyms: blowy
- using or containing too many words
= example: using or containing too many words
= synonyms: long-winded, tedious, wordy
- resembling the wind in speed, force, or variability
= example: resembling the wind in speed, force, or variability
- not practical or realizable
= synonyms: airy, visionary, Laputan
